aid.project.utils

Class UtilClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • aid.project.utils.UtilClass

  • public class UtilClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class that contains the generic tools. Implemented as singleton to avoid multi-initialization of objects.
    Author:
    adrian
